body_html:
I ran pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.8.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl inside of a virtualenv and

import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
a = tf.one_hot([1,0,2],3,"1","0")
sess.run(a)

reproduces it

body:
I ran `pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.8.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl` inside of a virtualenv and

```
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
a = tf.one_hot([1,0,2],3,"1","0")
sess.run(a)
```

reproduces it
